text: @nanoscale_rsc We recieved an invitation months ago, we prepared a thorough study, drafter the manuscript, and submitted our manuscript!  But it recieved an editorial rejection just 1 h after submission, with the fantastic offer to transfer to RSC advances. We call this a bait and switch.

Short notice, but I'm competing in Falling Walls Tokyo today. Tune in if you are interested in hearing about my work I under 3 minutes.
